meta.title: Build Production-Ready Products in 90 Days | Uxioma
meta.description: AI-Augmented, Human-Led engineering for early-stage startups. Senior engineers build production-ready MVPs in 90 days. Founder-to-founder partnership.
meta.ogTitle: Build Production-Ready Products in 90 Days | Uxioma
meta.ogDescription: AI-Augmented, Human-Led engineering for early-stage startups. Senior engineers build production-ready MVPs in 90 days. Founder-to-founder partnership.

hero.h1: Build the first real version of your company in 90 days.
hero.subtitle: A boutique engineering partner helping founders turn validated ideas into production-ready products — fast, focused, and senior-led.

cost.h2: The cost of getting this wrong is high.
cost.p1: You validated the idea. You have users or commitments. You've raised or have revenue. Now you need the foundation that scales.
cost.p2: But many founders find themselves stuck: MVPs held together with duct tape. Unclear product direction. Rewrites every 6 months. Fragmented teams making disconnected decisions. Slow execution when speed matters most.
cost.p3: Every month spent on the wrong build creates technical debt that costs 10x to fix later.

forYou.title: This is for you if:
items: You have a validated idea or existing users
You need a production-ready foundation, not another prototype
You want senior decision-making, not junior execution
You value clarity and momentum over endless iteration
You want a clean handoff and independence afterward

notFit.title: Not a fit if:
items: You're looking for the cheapest option
You need staff augmentation or body shop resources
You want open-ended scope and ongoing maintenance
You're seeking a feature factory without strategic direction
You need to explore if the idea works at all

engagement.subtitle: Fixed scope. Senior-led. Designed for momentum.

01.title: Discovery & Product Definition
01.description: We clarify what we're building, who it's for, and what success looks like. No assumptions, no guesswork.

02.title: Architecture
02.description: Senior engineers design the foundation: stack, data model, infrastructure, and technical decisions that will last.

03.title: Build
03.description: We execute with production quality from day one. Clean code, tested, documented, and ready to scale.

04.title: Hardening & Deployment
04.description: Security, performance, monitoring, and production readiness. We launch with confidence, not crossed fingers.

05.title: Handoff
05.description: Complete documentation, architecture review, and knowledge transfer. Your team inherits a system they can understand and extend.

articleTeaser.body: AI agents can compress weeks of implementation into days — but they don't replace engineering judgment. In this essay, I share what I've learned building with tools like Cursor and Claude, and why fundamentals like architecture, clarity, and review matter more than ever in an AI-augmented world.

aiAugmented.subtitle: Senior Engineering Judgment with AI Acceleration
aiAugmented.p1: AI has transformed how software gets built. Tasks that once required teams of engineers — boilerplate code, refactors, tests, documentation, architecture exploration — can now be automated or accelerated by AI-powered agents.
aiAugmented.p2: At Uxioma, we use AI to compress months of engineering effort into weeks, while keeping all product decisions in the hands of an experienced lead engineer.

aiBoosts.title: AI boosts our speed by:
items: Generating high-quality code drafts for rapid iteration
Producing documentation, tests, and refactors faster
Turning conversations into structured product requirements
Reducing the risk of costly rewrites

aiAugmented.p4: Every architectural decision, every tradeoff, every critical line of code is reviewed and owned by a senior engineer. AI accelerates the work — experience ensures it's done right.
aiAugmented.p6: A production-ready foundation in 90 days, with the clarity and quality of a senior engineering team — but the speed of an AI-empowered studio.

articleLink.text: For a deeper dive into our philosophy on AI-augmented engineering, read our essay
articleLink.label: AI-Augmented, Human-Led Engineering: The Loom Has Arrived

whyUs.h2: Senior Engineering Partner for Early-Stage Startups
whyUs.subtitle: See how we've helped founders build production-ready products.

senior.title: Senior involvement
senior.description: No junior developers figuring it out on your dime. Decisions are made by people who've been here before.

faster.title: Faster decision cycles
faster.description: Small, focused team. No layers of project managers. Direct communication with people who write the code.

opinionated.title: Opinionated stack
opinionated.description: We use proven, modern tools. No endless technology debates. We know what works and get started immediately.

handoff.title: Clean handoff
handoff.description: Complete documentation, clear architecture, and knowledge transfer. You own the code and can extend it independently.

noDependencies.title: No long-term dependencies
noDependencies.description: We build so you can continue. No vendor lock-in, no proprietary frameworks, no ongoing retainer required.

fixedScope.title: Fixed scope, clear timeline
fixedScope.description: 90 days. Defined deliverables. Predictable investment. You know what you're getting and when.

contact.h2: We take on a small number of projects.
contact.subtitle: Let's talk and see if we're a fit.
